DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project create database collect information NEW Keiki Program . The information collect project use evaluate program . The NEW Keiki program promote healthy lifestyle behavior change .
DOC.brief_title: NEW Keiki Family Based Intervention Combat Childhood Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: A database contain pre post program information develop . For referred patient , database contain information relate following : - Past medical history - Obesity-related Medical co-morbidities ( HTN , hyperlipidemia , e.g . ) - Lab value ( fast lipid , glucose , LFTs , HbA1c ) - Anthropometric data ( ht , weight , BMI ) select vital sign ( BP , HR ) - Fitness test data - Demographic data ( age , gender , ethnicity , socioeconomic status , geographical address ) - Answers lifestyle , attitude , health habit survey - Answers program survey - Contact information follow For participate family member ( parent , grandparent , sibling , e.g . ) data base contain information relate following : - Past medical history - Obesity-related Medical co-morbidities ( HTN , hyperlipidemia , e.g . ) - Anthropometric data ( ht , weight , BMI ) select vital sign ( BP , HR ) - Demographic data ( age , gender , ethnicity , socioeconomic status , geographical address ) - Answers lifestyle , attitude , health habit survey - Answers program survey - Contact information follow Once database create retrospective chart review do collect data patient complete program . This information obtain facility record program record . Individuals previously complete program contact ask provide consent include database . Only data individual provide consent include database . Participants program ask provide consent enroll program come follow visit . Only data individual provide consent include database . Subjects follow collect information lifestyle maintenance long term health outcome . The database query regularly provide information participant program . Descriptive statistic calculate describe study population pre post program . Outcomes analyzed use appropriate statistical test . Exploratory analysis conduct detect trend . Data store secure location limit access . All paper document store locked office lock cabinet . Electronic data store limited access computer . The database password protect encrypt . All participant assign study ID number . The study ID use transmission data . Data collection form use assign study ID . All data need transmit de-identified extent possible , password protect , encrypt .
